name: 10.13 "Don't Shoot...I'm Only the Psychiatrist" Trivia Game | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Whose birthday was it in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Elvis Presley.

	Carla was a major Elvis fan. She had brought in a cake that was left over from celebrating his birthday. Since it was Elvis' birthday, the episode took place the Thursday before his actual birthday.

Tony.

	Tony couldn't cut Sam's hair because he was in a car accident. Sam said Tony had two broken legs and had to cancel Sam's appointment.

questions.text: Who offered to cut Sam's hair?
questions.explanation:
Woody.

	Sam said: "That's cute. It took my mind off my hair for a minute." Sam Malone was the classic definition of the word shallow.

questions.text: Which group of Frasier's came to the bar?
options: The ones who were afraid of women
questions.explanation:
The low self-esteem group.

	Frasier said that he's never seen a sadder group. The group had heard about Frasier's last group (the ones who are afraid of women) coming to Cheers and thought they weren't good enough.

questions.text: What happened while Sam was getting a haircut?
options: He was cut with the shears
He fell out of the chair
questions.explanation:
Gum fell in his hair.

	Woody was chewing gum when it fell out of his mouth. Woody asked Sam, "When you came in did you have gum in your hair?"

questions.text: Which person was the group, Norm, and Cliff making fun of?
questions.explanation:
Frasier.

	They said he was a pompous fool. Frasier thought they meant Cliff until they told Frasier it was him.

questions.text: Why did the group's session cost a fee and a half?
questions.explanation:
It was a field trip.

	Frasier was upset about what they were saying about him and cancelled the session. The group at first wanted to apologize to him.

questions.text: What did Norm tell Frasier's group to do to Frasier?
questions.explanation:
Pants him.

	The group all agreed and headed after Frasier. The low self-esteem group was coming out of its shell, but at the sake of Frasier's self-esteem.

questions.text: Who shunned Woody back in Hanover?
questions.explanation:
The Amish.

	Norm didn't get that the Amish shunned Woody, and asked who shunned him back home. Woody replied, "The Amish, weren't you here for this part?"

questions.text: Who donned an Elvis wig with plans to get Carla?
questions.explanation:
John Hill.

	He wanted to sleep with her that evening, but she was too busy celebrating Elvis' birthday. So, he decided to get Carla by making her think that Elvis was trying to contact her.
